mapper.select: select distinct U_groupid as id , u_weightFrom as weightFrom , u_weightTo as weightTo from [@PRICE01WEIGHTRANG] where code = #{code}
SELECT t0.U_ProductCode AS productCode, t0.U_ProductName AS productName, t0.U_ServiceType AS serviceType FROM [PRICEDIRECTORY] t0 WHERE t0.U_ProductCode = #{productCode}
